name: Rock Legend: A new rhythm game
name_original: Rock Legend: A new rhythm game
description:
- A fun guitar rhythm style game.
- This is music games, simulated guitar for those who want to feel free to play your favorite music. You can play your favorite music inspired by the falling notes on the screen.
- You can play with the preload songs or your local music files by your favorite artists. This game includes a brand new visual experience with beautiful lighting effects and animations.
- You can choose 3 difficulty levels.
- Enjoy and thank you for downloaded game.
